TopicTitle: Settings.cfg will reset if it can't detect previously-mapped joystick

Articles.Content: Dunno where to go to post an official bug, but I've tested and confirmed with my Saitek X52 that if I do not have it plugged in, KSP will reset the settings.cfg file. This wasn't an issue in earlier KSP versions.
This issue (and several variations on it) has already been reported to the official bug tracker.
